org.jooby.assets

Class NgAnnotate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.assets.AssetOptions
      • org.jooby.assets.AssetProcessor
        • org.jooby.assets.NgAnnotate

  • public class NgAnnotate
extends AssetProcessor

    ng-annotate

    ng-annotate add, remove and rebuild AngularJS dependency injection annotations.

    usage

     assets {
   fileset {
     home: ...
   }

   pipeline {
     dev: [ng-annotate]
     dist: [ng-annotate]
   }
 }

    options

     assets {
   ...
   ng-annotate {
     add: true
     remove: false
   }
 }
    Since:
    0.11.0
    Author:
    edgar
